official_title: Designating May 27, 1991, Memorial Day, as a national day of celebration recognizing the extraordinary bravery of members of the United States Armed Forces serving in the Persian Gulf region in connection with Operation Desert Shield/Storm.

summary.text: Designates May 27, 1991, Memorial Day, as a national day of celebration recognizing the extraordinary bravery of members of the U.S. Armed Forces serving in the Persian Gulf region in connection with Operation Desert Shield/Storm.
